headlines.description: Mads Roerslev scored his first goal for Brentford to give them a comeback 2-1 home win over Aston Villa in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roerslev gives Brentford comeback win over Villa

headlines.description: — Alexis Mac Allister scored twice to lead Brighton to a 3-2 win at Everton that piled more pressure on manager Rafael Benitez on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton wins 3-2 at Everton, adding to pressure on Benitez

headlines.description: Late goals from Stuart Dallas and substitute Daniel James earned Leeds United a crucial 3-1 victory over Burnley on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leeds strike late to earn crucial win over Burnley

headlines.description: Chelsea and Liverpool were both dealt a blow in the Premier League title race as they played out a thrilling 2-2 draw at Stamford Bridge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea, Liverpool lose ground after thrilling draw
